About Me

Sep 17th, 2014 4:25 pm

My name is Chris Keavey and I have been interested in website development for longer than I care to tell you here.

I live in Bristol in the United Kingdom.

This is my own personal blog but the subject matter here will all be about Website Development - with the occasional spillage over into wider tech.

What I’m up to this month…

Currently I’m perfecting my grunt configuration and workflow.

Loving Sublime Text 3 now that I have it configured properly.

Finding my way around GitHub. I will be attempting to build all my projects from now on with git and GitHub.

…and, of course, I’m experimenting with this new Octopress blog!
